attributes.action: Stop mobile phone companies 'locking' mobile phones to their company.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the end of a contract lasting anything from 12 to 18 months I feel that it is unreasonable for the mobile phone companies to charge a fee to unlock a mobile phone so that it may be used with another phone companies sim card.
In fact it should be made illegal to lock the phone at all. 
I would be grateful for support for this petition. Thank you
